Detailed Description

Sundew H. Shin

Variable Documentation

W WGMap
 

Initial value:

 function(){var self = this;
    if (!GBrowserIsCompatible()) {
        alert('Sorry,\nYou either have no valid GMap key or Google Map does not support this browser though Wednus Platform does.');
        return false;
    }
    this.core = {}; 
    this.body = document.createElement('div');
    W.run(addMap);

    function addMap(){
        W.add(self);
        self.core = new GMap(self.body);
        self.core.centerAndZoom(new GPoint(-122.1419, 37.4419), 4);
    }
}
WGMap Constructor.

prepare '.body', the presentation layer Wednus can recognize and construct a GMap object.

Examples:
CodeExample.html, and WGMap.html.
